meanings.sent1: The company stored all their products in the godowns.
meanings.sent2: The godowns in the city were filled with various goods.
meanings.sent3: The godowns were so full that they started spilling out like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent4: The godowns stood like silent giants guarding the valuable items within.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the godowns felt like entering a maze of stacked boxes and crates.

meanings.definition: To store goods in a warehouse.
meanings.sent1: They decided to godowns all the excess inventory to free up space.
meanings.sent2: The company godowns their products in different locations for easy distribution.
meanings.sent3: I will godowns all the extra supplies in the warehouse, neatly organized.
meanings.sent4: She carefully godowns each item, making sure to label them correctly.
meanings.sent5: The workers quickly godowns the newly arrived shipments to keep everything organized.
